attributes.action: Print "Live Free 08088010800" On Goverment correspondence and NHS prescriptions.
attributes.additional_details: Print "live free 08088010800 Providing free help and advice about violence against women, domestic abuse and sexual violence" On all Goverment correspondence and NHS prescriptions.By having the number given to everyone you will access those that are housebound or who are living in fear.Live free can also signpost other vulnerable groups to help they need.
attributes.background: Print "Live Free 08088010800 Providing free help and advice about violence against women, domestic abuse and sexual violence" On  all Goverment correspondence and NHS prescriptions.By having the number given to everyone you will access those that are housebound or who are living in fear.

rejection.details: The Live Fear Free Helpline is managed by Welsh Women’s Aid and funded by Welsh Government, so it wouldn't be appropriate to include this on all UK Government correspondence.
